ygData.subject: RE: Re: Pottery Deities DISCOVERED!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: You lucky SOB :P  Wow that is great.  I take it you are holding off on the recipe a bit?  there is someone in game that has been bugging me to make deities
ygData.messageBody:
You lucky SOB :P Wow that is great. I take it you are holding off on the
recipe a bit? there is someone in game that has been bugging me to make
deities forever. though I never got around to trying to figure it out. My
big question is....WHAT ARE THEY FOR??

Thanks! Hints are welcome :)
Tanana
Master Brewer, Potter, Beggar
